Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Scooby-Doo! - Mystery Mayhem + Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase (USA) (En,Fr,De+En)
Game.plot: Whether you're in the mood to solve a supernatural mystery or chase down the creator of the Phantom Virus, you'll find plenty to do in the Scooby-Doo Two Games in 1 Double Pack. The compilation includes two games based on the animated series: Scooby-Doo Mystery Mayhem and Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase. This is your chance to help Scooby and his friends gather clues, solve puzzles, and defeat various enemies.Cheat: Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase: Cheat mode.On the password screen enter CHTMD2 as a password. This will unlock cheat mode. During game-play hold down the required buttons to unlock special abilities. Cheat: Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase: Cheat mode.Enter these passwords at the password Menu.Cheat: At the password screen, enter CHTMD2 to unlock the following abilities duiring game playCheat: Enter the passwordsCheat: At the main menu, go to "Password" and enter the following codes to unlock the different levels:Cheat: The following passwords are for each stage on difficult.Cheat: Enter VRSN2 as a password. The build date can be found in the options menu.
